description:
Nowadays, the mafia world is ruled by Italy's strongest family, the Vongola. Vongola's current head, ninth in the row, is an old man ready for retirement. But before he can hand down his position, he needs help from a professional Hitman to prepare the next generation Boss for ruling over Vongola and the mafia world itself.

Sawada Tsunayoshi is just your ordinary teenage boy who attends Junior High and sucks at it. He is unpopular, has no friends, and is desperately in love with a girl from his class. But his life takes an extraordinary turn when Tsunayoshi meets Reborn, an infamous hitman, who the ninth boss of Vongola has sent to train Tsunayoshi for his upcoming title.

(Source: Katekyo Hitman Reborn! FC)
synonyms: ครูพิเศษจอมป่วน รีบอร์น!

tags.name: Mafia
tags.description: Centered around Italian organised crime syndicates.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: Age Regression
tags.description: Prominently features a character who was returned to a younger state.

tags.name: Time Skip
tags.description: Features a gap in time used to advance the story.

tags.name: Chibi
tags.description: Features "super deformed" character designs with smaller, rounder proportions and a cute look.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Slapstick
tags.description: Prominently features comedy based on deliberately clumsy actions or embarrassing events.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Time Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features time-traveling or other time-warping phenomena.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Alternate Universe
tags.description: Features multiple alternate universes in the same series.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Anti-Hero
tags.description: Features a protagonist who lacks conventional heroic attributes and may be considered a borderline villain.

tags.name: Ghost
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a ghost.

tags.name: Chuunibyou
tags.description: Prominently features a character with "Middle School 2nd Year Syndrome", who either acts like a know-it-all adult or falsely believes they have special powers.

node.description:
__Agency:__ Ogipro The Next Co. Inc.

[Blog](http://ameblo.jp/takeuchi-junko/) | [Twitter](http://www.twitter.com/junkotakeuchi45)

Married to voice actor [Kenji Hamada](https://anilist.co/staff/95371/Kenji-Hamada) since 2006 and has two children.

**Non-Anime Roles:**
- Olorun - Genshin Impact (VG)

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/近藤隆)

__Debut__: 1998

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/amano_akira_)

Akira Amano is the author and mangaka of the shonen manga Katekyo Hitman Reborn! They were born in 1973, but the month and day are unknown.  Amano began in 1998 with a job at Weekly Young Magazine. They also held a job at Shueisha Publishing Co, Ltd.  In 2002, Amano participated in a contest for aspiring mangaka and was one of the lucky winners, with their comic Monkey Business published in Young Magazine.  In 2004, they finally found success with the humorous and classy manga Katekyo Hitman Reborn! (or, for short, just Reborn!), and that thanks to their readers' support. This new manga was advertised more and more in Shonen Jump and became a hit. Two years later, their manga was made into an anime series by Artland studios. 

Their ideas for Reborn!: Amano had some crazy ideas to entertain readers with. They came up with weird characters to add spice to the humor, a story written especially to be unique, and fast-paced action.    

Other works:  Boy Spin (1998)  Hot Blast Baseball Legendary (1999)  Pu Chipu Chirabii (2000)  Monkey Business (2002)  Tapir Hearts HAWK! (2003)  Katekyo Hitman Reborn! (2004)    Colleagues:  Ken Osamu Sakaki  KAITO  Main pine of indigo  Kobayashi  Kasuga truth

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ToshiSahashi)

__Toshihiko Sahashi__ is a Japanese composer and arranger. He graduated from Tokyo National University of Fine Arts and Music in 1986. Sahashi has composed music for various anime series (including OVAs, films, and drama CDs), video games, films, dramas, and musicals.

The style of his composition is richly symphonic and classical (occasionally jazz). The use of sophisticated compositional techniques, as well as complicated harmony writing such as fugue can often be heard in his work, demonstrating his solid training in the western classical music. He also uses keyboard instruments to deliver more sentimental soundtracks to good effect.

[Agency Profile](http://amuleto.jp/talents/yoshidahitomi.html) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/happy-mipyoko-life/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/hiTomi_713)

__Height:__ 155 cm

Member of the duet [Blue Drops](https://anilist.co/staff/106305/Blue-Drops) with [Saori Hayami](https://anilist.co/staff/95869/Saori-Hayami).

[Official Website](https://www.lovely-mocochang.com) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/user/LMCofficial) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/LMC_staff) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/LM.Cofficial) | [Weibo](https://www.weibo.com/LMC2019Official?is_all=1)

LM.C (short for "Lovely-Mocochang.Com") are a duo composed of Aiji from Pierrot and Maya, the guitarist of Ishihara Gundan, Miyavi's live band. Maya founded LM.C in 2003 with a little help from his friends, but the band really got off the ground only when Aiji joined him in 2006 after Pierrot disbanded, taking the position of guitarist and allowing Maya to concentrate on singing. The new band was quick to score in Japan and abroad with its smart brand of dance-rock sporting the sprawling label of "new century electrock," courtesy of the bandmembers.
Pony Canyon signed them in 2006, and soon released their debut pair of singles, Trailers (Gold) and Trailers (Silver) (both 2006). LM.C did a lot of touring in 2007, including a stint at the famous Shibuya-AX venue, and in 2008, released the EP Super Glitter Loud Box as well as four more singles, one of which, "Oh My Juliet," was linked to the anime series Red Garden, while "Boys & Girls" was featured in the anime Reborn! LM.C returned to Reborn! in 2008 with another single, 88, following it by re-releasing their EP as the full-length album Super Glitter Loud Box (2008) and launching their first world tour, during which they debuted in the U.S. at the Anime Expo in Los Angeles. LM.C managed to slip another album, Gimmical Impact!, into their 2008 schedule, and in early 2009, they toured Europe and even visited South America, a rare destination for Japanese bands. 

(Source: Spotify)

[Official Website](https://www.lovely-mocochang.com) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/user/LMCofficial) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/LMC_staff) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/LM.Cofficial) | [Weibo](https://www.weibo.com/LMC2019Official?is_all=1)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/589238508)

Originating from [Artland](https://anilist.co/studio/8/), currently affiliated with [CloverWorks](https://anilist.co/studio/6222/CloverWorks).

Had four singles such as Hana (2007), Distance/I am,届...and Last Cross.Hana is an ending theme for the anime Blue Dragon though it wasn't very popular. Last Cross is one of her more well known songs and is featured as an opening theme in Katekyo Hitman Reborn.     She was once a part of the group, Sister Q, but decided to go solo and now works under the PONY CANYON FLIGHTMASTER label. Mitsuoka is from the Aichi prefecture of Japan.

Affiliated with [Studio Silver](https://anilist.co/studio/6240/). Older brother of [You Yoshinari](https://anilist.co/staff/102998/).

He is known for having reached great expertise in many techniques from realistic animation to digital compositing. This gives him the ability to have full control over his works, often being responsible for the key frames, in-betweens, finishing, photography and backgrounds of the scenes he is in charge of.

His skilled use of coloring and compositing, together with the realistic depiction of movement make his works to be often mistaken for computer generated animation.

**Notable works outside anime:**
~!
- Ghost in the Shell (Video Game, 1997) (OP Key Animation)
- Tales of Phantasia (Video Game, 1998) (Cutscene Director, Animation Director, Key Animation)
- Valkyrie Profile Series (Video Game, 1999-2008) (Character Design, Art Design) 
- Kafu ~Kono Shirabe ga Kimi ni Todokimasu You ni~ (Visual Novel, 2001) (OP Key Animation, In-between Animation, Background Art, Digital Paint, Photography, CG Animation)
- Sakura Wars 3: Paris is Burning? (Video Game, 2001) (OP Key Animation, In-Between Animation, Background Art, Digital Paint, Photography)
- Akiiro Renka (Visual Novel, 2005) (OP Director, Animation Character Design, Key Animation, In-between Animation, Background Art, Digital Paint, Photography)
- Muv-Luv Alternative (Visual Novel, 2006) (Cutscene Mecha Design, Key Animation, In-between Animation, Background Art, Digital Paint, Photography) !~

__Debut Date:__ March 14, 2001  

W-inds is a Japanese pop boy band managed by Vision Factory and signed to the Pony Canyon label since 2000. The group consists of Ryohei Chiba and Keita Tachibana; Ryuichi Ogata left the group in 2020. Tachibana is the lead singer of the group, while Chiba and Ogata provide backing vocals and rap.

__Members:__
• Ryohei Chiba (千葉涼平) born November 18, 1984 in Sapporo, Japan — Rapper, background singer, dancer
• Keita Tachibana (橘慶太) born December 16, 1985 in Fukuoka, Japan — Vocalist and dancer

__Former Members:__
• Ryuuichi Ogata (緒方龍一) born December 17, 1985  in Sapporo, Japan — Rapper, background singer, dancer
Splay stylized as SPLAY, was a Japanese rock band from Osaka, belonging to the label Pony Canyon. They broke up in 2008.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/kazuki_kato1007) | [Official Website](https://www.katokazuki.com/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFOg6faqBVo9nny1J0MEwsg/featured)

Kazuki Katou is a Japanese actor and singer known most notably for his role as Daisuke Kazama aka Kamen Rider Drake in Kamen Rider Kabuto and Keigo Atobe in The Prince of Tennis musicals.

node.description: Cherryblossom is a Japanese rock band from Tokyo, who debuted in 2007.

SuG is a Japanese rock band that formed in 2006. They are also part of the visual kei movement of Japan. The band has released two EPs, two full-length studio albums, and several singles. Until 2009, the band was signed to "Indie PSC", a subdivision of PS Company. As of 2010, they have signed onto a major label, Pony Canyon, and joined the forefront of major bands on PS Company. On October 7th, 2012, SuG announced they would officially leave PSC after their performance on December 29th, resulting in a temporary hiatus.  Members: Takeru – vocals Masato – guitar Yuji – guitar Chiyu – bass Shinpei – drums
